title: Is India’s ambiguous stance on global cyber norms becoming a strategic advantage?
text:
As the world’s largest democracy, which is also going to be one of the most digitised, India should have seized the initiative in shaping the debate on global cyber norms. The opportunity still beckons for India to help a polarised debate find a middle path on an issue that has long-term geopolitical, economic, ethical, and moral implications.
